alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 8:09PM CST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Missouri... Ohio River at Smithland Dam, Paducah, Cairo, Olmsted Lock and Dam. .Water levels along the Lower Ohio River are slowly falling. The river is forecast to fall below flood stage at Smithland Dam Friday, and at points downstream to Cairo next week. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly agricultural bottomland and low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 46.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 41.0 feet Saturday, March 19. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 47.0 feet on 04/04/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
